title: CLDF dataset accompanying List and Forkel's "Borrowing Detection in Multilingual Wordlists" from 2021
description: The CLDF dataset provides manually annotated and automated borrowings in SEA languages along with code by which borrowings can be detected.
citation: List, Johann-Mattis and Forkel, Robert (2021): Automated identification of borrowings in multilingual wordlists. Leipzig: Max Planck Institute for Evolutionary Anthropology.
